personalInfo.name: Marij Maryam
personalInfo.title: Web Developer & BSBA Student
personalInfo.summary: I am a passionate web developer and BSBA student with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. My journey in web development began with a curiosity about how websites work, which quickly evolved into a deep passion for creating digital experiences. Currently pursuing my Bachelor of Business Administration, I combine academic learning with hands-on project experience to build my skills and create meaningful web solutions.

experience.description: Worked as an intern gaining hands-on experience in web development and e-commerce solutions.
achievements: Collaborated with development team on multiple projects

experience.description: Currently working as an intern focusing on payment technologies and web development.
achievements: Developing web applications with modern frameworks
